role.argrole: benefactive or how it will help

example.parse:
ARG1 tells us how it helps
(VP (PRT (NEG_PART لن)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تجدي) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC نفعا)) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_NOM كل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المحاولات) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الحوارات) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN القناعات)))))))) (PUNC ,)

arg.g: all the attempts, discussions and convictions

example.arg: كل المحاولات و الحوارات و القناعات

example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-4 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM مظاهر) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العنف) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الانفعالات))) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لن)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تجدي) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1P نا))

arg.g: -NONE- < the images of violence and overreactions
